mapper.select: select imgUuid from t_sku_file where type = 1 and skuId = #{skuId} order by orderNum
mapper.update: update t_sku a left join (SELECT skuId,avg(score) as avgScore FROM fresh.t_comment group by skuId) b on a.id = b.skuId set a.avgScore = b.avgScore

update t_sku
set haopingQuantity = haopingQuantity+1
set zhongpingQuantity = zhongpingQuantity+1
set chapingQuantity = chapingQuantity+1
where id=#{skuId}
